detectCmp.exists: body:not([id]) > main#content > div:nth-child(4):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > span:nth-child(2):not([id]) > button:nth-child(3)#cookieBannerRejectBtn

optOut.waitForThenClick: body:not([id]) > main#content > div:nth-child(4):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > span:nth-child(2):not([id]) > button:nth-child(3)#cookieBannerRejectBtn
